title: Employment notice end
h1: When does your notice period end?
p1: Tell us when you'll finish with the respondent.

noticeEnds.required: Enter your notice date. For example, 23 3 2007
noticeEnds.dayRequired: Enter a day for your start date. For example, 23
noticeEnds.monthRequired: Enter a month for your start date. For example, 04
noticeEnds.yearRequired: Enter a year for your start date. For example, 1981
noticeEnds.invalidDate: You have entered an invalid date. Enter the date using the following format: 22 04 2014
noticeEnds.invalidYear: You have entered the year in an invalid format. Enter the whole year, for example 2014
noticeEnds.invalidDateInFuture: Date entered must be in the past
noticeEnds.invalidDateTooFarInPast: You have entered a year which is too far in the past
noticeEnds.invalidDateBeforeDOB: Date entered must not be earlier than your date of birth
